name: SetUpTag
description: Set a tag up ready for deployment: erasing/replacing the log, initialising the GPS and applying the configuration. NOTE: this will destroy all data on tag, please only have one device connected.

commands.description: Erase the log currently on the tag.
Create a new, blank log on the tag.
Load default config to the tag - remember to set a unique Device ID after provisioning.
Update the clock to the current date and time.
